name: Garbage Sorting Simulator
description:
Sort the garbage before it reaches the ocean to get the highest score

Here’s where to put each pice trash in thanks to @-Yara for the suggestion

Plastic Bottle 1 = Recycle

Plastic Bottle 2 = Recycle

Plastic Bottle 3 = Trash

Plastic Bottle 6 = Trash

Plastic Bottle 7 = Trash

Paper = Recycle

Foil = Recycle

Light Bulb = Trash

Egg = Trash

Milk Carton = Recycle 

Soda Can = Recycle

Play on scratch https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/557912932/

Play on turbowarp https://turbowarp.org/557912932

Credits
